name: River
description:
Have you ever thought about the afterlife? Will you encounter anything on the other side? Or maybe there is only one big nothingness that awaits you.




Something we can not comprehend entirely, something that stays a puzzle for countless minds that are vainly trying to solve it. Do we continue our way even when the body dies? Maybe there is a unique pass for each to follow, an adventure that awaits it's hero.



The goal of each level is pretty simple: to cross the river, but don't expect it will be an easy task.


Project Features Checklist

☐ 36 challenging levels

☐ 24 nontrivial achievements to extend gaming experience

☑ Awesome music ambiance by Slakker

☐ Multi-language ui

☑ Full gamepad support ( notes )

☑ Multiple endings

☐ Mobile device optimization & porting
